description: This file contains Tailwind CSS directives, CSS variable definitions for theming, global styles for typography, layout, buttons, inputs, utility classes, and styling for various UI components within a frontend web project.
calls: @apply inline-flex items-center justify-center font-semibold text-white rounded-lg
@apply w-full px-4 py-2 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 dark:border-white/10 bg-white dark:bg-neutral-900 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/40
@apply inline-flex items-center justify-center px-3 py-2 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-200 dark:border-white/10 dark:hover:border-white/20
